author: Staff Reporter
text:
As the Tamil Nadu Generation and Distribution Corporation will undertake maintenance works at its Hasthampatti substation, there will be nopower supply in the following areas between 9 a.m. and 5 p.m. on February 20.

The affected areas are Hasthampatti, Gandhi Road, Vincent, Maravaneri, Manakkadu, Chinna Tirupathi, Ramanathapuram, Kannankurichi, Housing Board, Kollapatti, Gorimedu, Kondappanaickenpatti, Ramakrishna Road, Rajaram Nagar, Sankar Nagar,

Four Road, Mittapudur, Sarada College Road, Alagapuram, Chettichavadi, Vinayagampatti and Yercaud, a release by K. Shanmugam, Executive Engineer, Operations and Maintenance, said.
title: Power shutdown
